## Bio

I am a Ph.D. student in the [Department of Applied Economics](https://apec.umn.edu/) at the University of Minnesota. My research focuses on using applied econometrics, machine learning, and general equilibrium models to study the economic impacts of climate change and extreme weather events (e.g., wildfires) at global and local scales.

## Research Interests
- Environmental and Resource Economics
- Spatial Economics
